channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Jusqu’à 8 mois d’attente : pourquoi certaines voitures électriques de Peugeot et Citroën ont autant de retard en ce moment
item.description: Les ambitions électriques de Stellantis se heurtent à la dure réalité industrielle. La production chaotique des batteries d'Automotive Cells Company (ACC) repousse de plusieurs mois la livraison de voitures électriques comme les Peugeot e-3008 et e-5008. Un premier revers pour l'usine française qui peine à trouver son rythme.

item.title: Presidents' Day sales 2026: The best tech deals from Apple, Sony, Roku and others
item.description: Presidents’ Day is a great time to buy appliances, mattresses and furniture as they are often on sale for the holiday. Tech also gets discounted around this time, but you have to do a bit more digging to find actually good deals. And this year, Presidents’ Day comes right after Valentine’s Day and Super Bowl 2026, which means there are some overlapping sales to consider. If you don’t want to sort through the mess of bad deals out there, Engadget has you covered. We’re curating the best President Day sales on tech we can find right here. We’ll update this post through the holiday as more deals ...

item.title: Why I’m skipping the Super Bowl TV sales for this $250 Lenovo laptop instead
item.description: The IdeaPad Slim 3i has a second life afterwards as the perfect Chromebook alternative and even comes with a year of Microsoft 365 free.

item.title: This Video of Hilariously Slow Robots Putting Olive Oil in a Bag Is Actually Pretty Impressive
item.description: Robots that can actually do things are not slick yet, and it's a relief when robotics companies don't hide from that.

item.title: À -40 %, ce TV Samsung sur roulettes (QHD et 120 Hz) est l’une des meilleures alternatives au LG StanbyMe
item.description: Le Samsung The Movingstyle est un TV monté sur un support à roulettes et sur batterie pour se glisser dans toutes les pièces de la maison. Si ce modèle original vous plaît, il vient de voir son prix chuter à 939 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros.

item.title: Why is the Trump administration really appealing its Meta loss?
item.description: After a federal judge ruled that Meta was not an illegal monopolist in a blow against the Federal Trade Commission, the agency issued what was in part a typical statement of disappointment. Another part of the statement was anything but: a political attack on the judge himself. "The deck was always stacked against us with […]

item.title: Trust by design: Updating your digital workplace charter for the age of AI assistants
item.description: Building trust-centric AI workplaces with a clear charter—trust, transparency, augmentation, agency, equity, and source integrity.

item.title: Interested in your first pair of bone conduction headphones? Try the excellent Shokz OpenRun – now down to a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The Shokz OpenRun are older now, but they remain some of the best bone conduction headphones you can buy if you're into running and exercise – and they're back down to a record-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Fundamental emerges from stealth with first major foundation model trained for tabular data
item.description: The deep learning revolution has a curious blind spot: the spreadsheet. While Large Language Models (LLMs) have mastered the nuances of human prose and image generators have conquered the digital canvas, the structured, relational data that underpins the global economy — the rows and columns of ERP systems, CRMs, and financial ledgers — has so far been treated as just another file format similar to text or PDFs.That's left enterprises to forecast business outcomes using the typical bespoke, labor-intensive data science process of manual feature engineering and classic machine learning algorith...

item.title: Data breach at govtech giant Conduent balloons, affecting millions more Americans
item.description: The ransomware attack at Conduent allowed hackers to steal a "significant number of individuals’ personal information" from the govtech giant's systems. Conduent handles personal and health data of more than 100 million people across America.

item.title: NGINX servers hijacked in global campaign to redirect traffic
item.description: Redirected traffic can be abused in multiple ways and victims would never know.

item.title: Forget Seahawks vs Patriots: Wix vs Squarespace is the real showdown at Super Bowl 2026
item.description: Emma Stone solves a 20-year-old problem with Squarespace, and Wix invests heavily in vibe coding.

item.title: I wasn't sure this premium robot vacuum was worth the money – but after using it every other night for 10 months, I've changed my mind
item.description: I'd recommend this robot vacuum to anyone with a shedding pet.

item.title: Nouvelle menace Windows : de faux économiseurs d’écran prennent le contrôle de votre PC
item.description: Une nouvelle campagne malveillante vise les ordinateurs Windows. Les pirates se servent d'économiseurs d’écran piégés pour prendre le contrôle de la machine des utilisateurs.

item.title: Voitures électriques : Nio rejoint Tesla dans un cercle très fermé, celui de la rentabilité
item.description: Onze ans après sa création, la marque chinoise Nio vient d'annoncer ses premiers profits sur le quatrième trimestre 2025. Une étape cruciale, mais qui reste à consolider dans un marché en pleine mutation.

item.title: Substack CEO informs users of a data breach
item.description: The digital publishing platform Substack has told some of its users that their data was stolen in a security breach. The affected account holders had their email addresses and phone numbers scraped in a hack that occurred in October 2025. In an email posted on Bluesky, Substack CEO, Christ Best, said the company became aware of the breach on February 3, which involved an "unauthorized third party to access limited user data without permission." While internal metadata was also shared in the hack, Best said that credit card numbers and other financial details were not. No passwords were obtaine...

item.title: OpenSSL 3 performance issues causing a scalability and security dilemma for organizations
item.description: OpenSSL 3.x creates a critical scalability and security dilemma for the industry, forcing organizations to evaluate alternative SSL libraries.

item.description: Oh, that looks so good.

item.title: JLab’s new Bluetooth speaker doubles as supersized headphones
item.description: JLab, a brand best known for its budget-friendly but well-featured wireless earbuds, has announced a new pair of headphones that are far less discreet. The oversized Blue XL Speaker Headphones look like an ill-timed April Fools' Day prank but are actually a pair of Bluetooth speakers cosplaying as wireless headphones. They're wearable, but for the […]...

item.description: One of our most anticipated movies of 2026 is getting a very cool-looking Lego set.

item.title: Fallout 4 and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle get Switch 2 release dates
item.description: Todd Howard made a surprise appearance at the end of Thursday’s Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase to share updates about a few Bethesda Game Studios that are coming to Nintendo Switch 2 this year. The first of those is Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition, which will hit the console on February 24.This version of Fallout 4 debuted on PC, Xbox and PlayStation in November. It includes the base game and all DLC, as well as Creation Club mods. It’ll land on Switch 2 just a few weeks after the second season of the Fallout TV show wrapped up. A Switch 2 version was previously announced, but we didn’t have ...

item.title: Fundamental raises $255 million Series A with a new take on big data analysis
item.description: Fundamental has built a new foundation model to solve an old problem: how to draw insights from the huge quantities of structured data produced by enterprises.

item.title: Are LTMs the next LLMs? This new type of AI can do what large-language models can’t
item.description: Fundamental, which just closed a $225 million funding round, develops ‘large tabular models’ for structured data like tables and spreadsheets. Large-language models (LLMs) have taken the world by storm, but they’re only one type of underlying AI model. An under-the-radar company, Fundamental, is set to bring a new type of enterprise AI model to the masses: large tabular models, or LTMs—which could have an even bigger impact for businesses....

item.title: Orange change le décodeur de son offre Livebox Fibre
item.description: Orange muscle son offre Livebox Fibre d'entrée de gamme en y intégrant désormais le décodeur TV 6.

item.title: Why some jobs trigger old fears
item.description: The past shows up at work not as a memory, but as a reflex. Work has a way of waking up parts of us we thought we’d outgrown.

item.title: Substack confirms data breach affects users’ email addresses and phone numbers
item.description: Substack said that customer data was accessed in October 2025, but wasn't discovered until early February.

item.description: The Bain-backed home furnishings seller is expected to begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday. Here’s what to know. Bob’s Discount Furniture, a Connecticut-based furniture retailer backed by Bain Capital, is putting it all on the table.

item.title: A Giant, 10 Skulls, and Rope-Bound Corpses: This Viking-Era ‘Execution Pit’ Has Stories to Tell
item.description: Archaeologists and students in England have uncovered a mass grave, which includes the remains of an exceptionally tall man with a hole in his skull.

item.title: Cette importante promotion sur le drone DJI Neo Fly et tous ses accessoires donne le vertige

item.title: ElevenLabs CEO: Voice is the next interface for AI
item.description: ElevenLabs CEO argued at Web Summit Qatar that voice is the next interface for AI, as OpenAI, Google, and Apple push conversational systems into wearables, new hardware, and everyday interactions.

item.title: Deux services d’Apple échappent aux règles européennes du DMA
item.description: Voilà une épine en moins dans le pied d'Apple, et même deux. La Commission européenne a en effet établi que ni Apple Plans, ni Apple Ads ne seront soumis aux dispositions contraignantes du règlement sur les marchés numériques (DMA).

item.title: A potential Starlink competitor just got FCC clearance to launch 4,000 satellites
item.description: Aspiring Starlink competitor Logos Space Services has secured FCC clearance to launch more than 4,000 broadband satellites into low Earth orbit by 2035, as reported by Space News. Under FCC regulations, the company must deploy half of the approved amount within the next seven years. The company is headed by its founder, Milo Medin, a former project manager at NASA as well as a former vice president of wireless services at Google. The company has been raising money since it opened its doors in 2023 and reportedly hopes to deploy its first satellite by 2027. Logos’ planned low Earth orbit const...

item.title: Une sonde de la Nasa remet en question la taille de Jupiter après 50 ans de certitudes
item.description: Jupiter serait finalement beaucoup plus petite et plate que ce que nous pensions. De nouvelles données récoltées par la sonde Juno dévoilent un nouveau visage de la géante gazeuse.

item.title: How to watch the Opening Ceremony at the 2026 Milan Cortina Winter Olympics
item.description:
The 2026 Milan Cortina Winter Olympic Games kick off with the Opening Ceremony this Friday. Here's how to watch. (REUTERS/Claudia Greco)
REUTERS / Reuters
The 2026 Milan Cortina Winter Olympics begin this week, and this year's Opening Ceremony promises to be one for the ages. The three-hour event will feature performances from Mariah Carey and Andrea Bocelli, 3,000 athletes participating in the Parade of Nations, and not one but two Olympic cauldrons being lit. (One at Milan's Arco della Pace, since Milan will serve as the main hub for this year's Games, and the other in the Alpin...

item.title: Voici les prix des trottinettes Xiaomi Electric Scooter 6, avec une belle surprise en prime
item.description: Xiaomi avait dévoilé sa nouvelle gamme de trottinettes électriques il y a quelques semaines, mais sans parler des prix. Les voici en avance, plus celui d'un modèle Ultra pas encore annoncé officiellement.

item.title: What to know about the critical minerals trading bloc the U.S. wants to build with allies
item.description: At a conference with allies in Washington, Vice President Vance said some countries have signed on to the trading bloc. The Trump administration announced Wednesday that it wants to create a critical minerals trading bloc with its allies and partners, using tariffs to maintain minimum prices and defend against China’s stranglehold on the key elements needed for everything from fighter jets to smartphones.Vice President JD Vance said the U.S.-China trade war over the past year exposed how dependent most countries are on the critical minerals that Beijing largely dominates, so collective action ...

item.description: Le feuilleton du téléphone « made in Musk » prend un nouveau tournant. Alors que SpaceX s'apprête à entrer en Bourse et que Starlink cartonne, les rumeurs autour d'un appareil mobile propriétaire reviennent en force. Et cette fois, la réponse du patron a subtilement changé.

item.title: The Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones drop to a record-low price
item.description: Now's a great time to consider upgrading your wireless headphones since you can get our favorites at their best price yet. The Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones are down to $398, which is $62 off and the best discount we've seen since their debut. The sale applies to all three colorways. These easily topped our list of the best wireless headphones. They are, in a word, fantastic. The headphones are packed with premium features, like advanced ANC. There are a whopping 12 ANC microphones throughout and a brand-new chip to power the feature. The end result? It successfully blocks background noise at med...

item.title: ExpressVPN launches new-look plans with 4 huge new features — here's what it means for your VPN subscription
item.description: ExpressVPN has launched four new features that'll be included in its VPN plans. We've broken down everything you need to know about what's changing.

item.title: Une Xiaomi SU7 prend feu en pleine rue et ça n’a rien avoir avec la batterie
item.description: Un incendie impliquant une Xiaomi SU7 dans la province du Liaoning, en Chine, a alimenté les débats sur la sécurité des véhicules électriques chinois. Pourtant, selon le constructeur, la batterie n'est pas en cause. Mais ce fait divers vient une nouvelle fois alimenter de vieux démons autour de la voiture électrique et des incendies.

item.title: Snowflake thinks AI coding agents are solving the wrong problem
item.description: As coding agents stumble in production, the battle for enterprise AI is shifting to the governed data layer. AI coding agents are suddenly everywhere, the latest thing Silicon Valley cannot stop talking about. From venture-backed startups to splashy big tech keynotes, the promise sounds the same: just describe what you want, and the AI will build it for you. It is a seductive idea, especially in a world where software projects are notorious for moving slowly. But inside large companies, that vision is already starting to unravel....

item.title: Senators ask Meta why it waited so long to make teen accounts private by default
item.description: A group of senators has written a letter to Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg asking why his company delayed launching key protections for users under 18. The letter, signed by Brian Schatz (D-HI), Katie Britt (R-AL), Amy Klobuchar (D-MN), James Lankford (R-OK), and Christopher Coons (D-DE), cites court documents unsealed late last year that revealed claims […]...

item.title: OpenAI Frontier is a single platform to control your AI agents
item.description: Managing humans is hard. Managing AI agents is… also hard. That's why OpenAI is launching a new platform called OpenAI Frontier, which it says will help businesses "build, deploy, and manage" AI agents, even those not made by OpenAI itself. OpenAI's description of Frontier sounds something like HR for AI. "Frontier gives agents the same […]

item.title: Your email is about to get an AI-powered security boost - ExpressVPN launches new email protection and privacy tool for the new world of AI attacks
item.description: ExpressMailGuard allows unlimited email aliases, automated filtering, and cross-device management.

item.title: 'The best way to protect user data is not to collect it in the first place' - top VPN maker reveals ExpressAI, possibly the most secure and safe AI platform around right now
item.description: ExpressAI brings privacy-first AI by applying VPN-level encryption, secure enclaves, and zero data collection, allowing safe AI interactions globally.

item.title: ExpressVPN unveils new standalone password manager – ExpressKeys is now available for iOS and Android
item.description: ExpressVPN has introduced a dedicated password manager app, ExpressKeys.

item.title: ExpressVPN launches four new standalone apps
item.description: ExpressVPN is launching a new cybersecurity suite consisting of four standalone products: a password manager called ExpressKeys, a masked email relay called ExpressMailGuard, an encrypted AI platform called ExpressAI and an app called Identity Defender that monitors public information for any threats to your identity. All four apps are being rolled into ExpressVPN's existing multi-tiered pricing structure.ExpressKeys and ExpressMailGuard have officially launched and are now available to subscribers. Identity Defender launches for U.S. customers only on February 26. ExpressAI was originally pla...

item.title: Amazon Germany fined $70 million for 'influencing' third-party Marketplace pricing
item.description: The Bundeskartellamt, or the Federal Cartel Office of Germany, has prohibited Amazon from continuing its practice of using mechanisms to control the prices charged by sellers on its platform in the country. Germany’s competition regulator explained that the company uses “various price control mechanisms” to review prices set by third-party Markerplace sellers. If the website deems a specific listing’s pricing as too high, it allegedly removes the listing altogether or prevents it from being prominently displayed in the Buy Box section that lets you quickly purchase items. If those listings are...

item.title: What the hell is Moltbook, the social network for AI agents?
item.description: Last week, a new social network was created and it's already gone very, very viral even though it's not meant for human users. I'm talking, of course, about Moltbook, a Reddit-like platform that's populated entirely by AI agents. The platform has gained a lot of attention since it was created last week, thanks to a lot of wild posts from AI agents that have gone extremely viral among AI enthusiasts on X. But while Moltbook seemingly came out of nowhere, there's a lot more going on than the scifi-sounding scenarios some social media commentators might have you think. What is Moltbook and where...

item.title: ExpressVPN launches new free privacy tools for subscribers: VPN for email, secure AI, and more
item.description: ExpressVPN is rolling out a suite of new and reworked digital security tools: ExpressAI, ExpressMailGuard, ExpressKeys, and Identity Defender.

item.title: Tesla hit with another wrongful death suit over its electronic door handles
item.description: The mother of 20-year-old man who died after becoming trapped in his burning Tesla Model Y is suing the company over its electronic door handles. It's the latest wrongful death case centering on Tesla's door handles, which have triggered numerous customer complaints over the years and is now under investigation by the federal safety regulators. […]

item.title: Sony says Ghost of Yotei made a 'significant contribution' to the 8 million PS5 units that were sold in late 2025, a feat that surpassed the Nintendo Switch 2 by 1 million units
item.description: The PS5 managed to outsell the Nintendo Switch 2 in the latter half of 2025 by 1 million units. The console sold 8 million units between October and December, which Sony partly attributes to Ghost of Yotei and other live service games.

item.title: Ce VTC électrique polyvalent, parfait en ville comme hors bitume, vient de perdre 1 400 €
item.description: Aussi bien à l’aise hors bitume qu’en ville, le Scott Axis 20 Wave est un VTC électrique polyvalent qui ne manque pas d’atouts, et dont le prix devient nettement plus abordable en passant de 4 199 euros à 2 799 euros.
